title: Investigate Indian War Crimes in Sri Lanka : RAPE of Tamil Women
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – In 2013 Indian Prime Minister decided to vote against Sri Lanka in Geneva because of India’s concern for the ‘dignity” and ‘self-respect’ of Sri Lankan Tamils. In 2014 that changed to India not wanting to hurt Tamil sentiment before elections (Indian elections). But what did India do to the…
